ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Lens: 6.0mm
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Package included: 1 of CMOS camera, 1 of 12V DC regulated power supply, 1 of extension cable and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Audio Video Outdoor Day Night Vision 520TVL IR-Cut Filter Infrared Bullet Security Camera Home CCTV Surveillance with Power Supply and Audio Video Power Cable IR809AS A14
